HOME_SECTION.TITLE: Misr Gypsum Company
HOME_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Misr Gypsum Company is a trusted leader in the Egyptian market, offering high-performance gypsum solutions tailored to meet the demands of modern construction. With over a decade of experience, we pride ourselves on our ability to blend innovation with consistency, delivering products that exceed industry standards. Our expert team collaborates closely with clients and partners to ensure that every project is executed with precision, professionalism, and a deep understanding of quality. From residential to large-scale commercial developments, Misr Gypsum is the reliable partner you can count on for excellence and long-term success.

ABOUT_SECTION.SHORT_DESC: For over 12 years, Misr Industrial Supplies has built a solid reputation as a trusted partner in the construction and industrial sectors. Backed by deep expertise and a dedicated team, we've successfully served more than 50 clients and delivered over 100 projects with precision and quality. Our 98%+ satisfaction rate reflects our unwavering commitment to excellence, innovation, and delivering fully integrated supply solutions that meet international standards.

PRODUCTS_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: We offer a wide range of high-quality products that meet your project needs from construction to finishing.

BRANCHES_SECTION.BRANCH_2: Nasr City Branch – Makram Ebeid Street
BRANCHES_SECTION.BRANCH_4: Mohandessin Branch – Gameat El Dowal Street

PARTNERS_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Our strong partnerships extend to the largest gypsum companies in the Arab world

FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: A leading company in gypsum solutions and modern finishing with years of experience.

HERO.TITLE: Our Projects Reflect the Quality of Our Products
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Every project we delivered relied on our durable and modern products. Explore the materials that made it all possible.

PRODUCT.SECTION_SUBTITLE: Explore projects by product type and see their applications in the Egyptian and global market.

GYPSUM_1.TITLE: Elite Palace – Luxury Gypsum Decorations
GYPSUM_1.DESCRIPTION: Manual classical gypsum work inside a private palace in Rehab, using custom molds and detailed ornaments.
GYPSUM_1.CHALLENGE: Achieving a balance between luxury and fine details while maintaining execution speed.
GYPSUM_1.SOLUTION: Using custom gypsum molds and precise manual execution within record time.
GYPSUM_1.FEEDBACK: The client praised the execution quality and attention to detail.

GYPSUM_2.TITLE: Elite Villa – Modern Ceiling with Hidden Lights
GYPSUM_2.DESCRIPTION: Modern ceiling design with hidden LED lights to create a warm ambiance.
GYPSUM_2.CHALLENGE: Integrating lighting within the gypsum work without visible gaps or flaws.
GYPSUM_2.SOLUTION: Using powder gypsum with integrated lighting profiles.
GYPSUM_2.FEEDBACK: The ambiance completely changed after implementation.

BOARDS_1.TITLE: Office Building – Fire-Resistant Gypsum Partitions
BOARDS_1.DESCRIPTION: Installation of internal partitions using high fire-resistant gypsum boards to secure the workplace.
BOARDS_1.CHALLENGE: Providing thermal and acoustic insulation along with fire resistance.
BOARDS_1.SOLUTION: Using double-layered boards with internal rock wool filling.
BOARDS_1.FEEDBACK: The outcome exceeded expectations in terms of comfort and safety.

BOARDS_2.TITLE: Co-Working Spaces – Flexible Layout System
BOARDS_2.DESCRIPTION: Removable walls were implemented to provide a dynamic working environment.
BOARDS_2.CHALLENGE: Enabling layout reconfiguration based on changing needs.
BOARDS_2.SOLUTION: Designing modular units that are easy to dismantle and rearrange.
BOARDS_2.FEEDBACK: We can now adapt office layout to different projects easily. Excellent!

FINISHING_1.TITLE: European Villa – Full Interior Finishing
FINISHING_1.DESCRIPTION: Full interior finishing based on European standards in a New Cairo villa.
FINISHING_1.CHALLENGE: Blending European design with local context without mismatch.
FINISHING_1.SOLUTION: Selecting high-quality local materials inspired by European style.
FINISHING_1.FEEDBACK: Feels like a home in Paris now. Thank you!

FINISHING_2.TITLE: Hotel Finishing – VIP Suites & Rooms
FINISHING_2.DESCRIPTION: High-end hotel rooms finished with moisture and mold resistant materials.
FINISHING_2.CHALLENGE: Achieving international hotel quality in record time.
FINISHING_2.SOLUTION: Coordinated parallel work across multiple teams to reduce time.
FINISHING_2.FEEDBACK: Rooms were ready ahead of schedule and met international standards.

FAQSECTION.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQSECTION.SUBTITLE: Here we answer the most common questions clients have before requesting our service.

QUESTIONS.SERVICES: What types of services do you offer?
QUESTIONS.PARTIAL: Do you provide full finishing or only partial?
QUESTIONS.CUSTOM_DESIGN: Can I request a custom design?
QUESTIONS.DURATION: What is the average project duration?
QUESTIONS.START: Can the work start immediately after agreement?
QUESTIONS.ESTIMATE: Can I know the cost before starting?
QUESTIONS.WARRANTY: Do you offer warranty for your work?
QUESTIONS.CLIENT_MATERIALS: Do you use materials chosen by the client?

ANSWERS.SERVICES: We offer all general contracting services, from excavation and construction to interior and exterior finishing.
ANSWERS.PARTIAL: Yes, we provide both full and partial finishing based on client needs.
ANSWERS.CUSTOM_DESIGN: Absolutely. We implement your vision and collaborate with professional engineers.
ANSWERS.DURATION: It depends on the project size, but we always stick to the agreed schedule.
ANSWERS.START: Usually yes. After site inspection and requirement clarification, we set an accurate start date.
ANSWERS.ESTIMATE: We provide a free inspection and detailed cost estimate before signing.
ANSWERS.PAYMENT_METHODS: We accept cash, bank transfer, and electronic payment.
ANSWERS.DOWNPAYMENT: Yes, a percentage is paid in advance to reserve the schedule and begin preparations.
ANSWERS.WARRANTY: All work includes a written warranty depending on the service type (from 6 months to 3 years).
ANSWERS.CLIENT_MATERIALS: Yes, the client may choose the materials, or we can supply them if preferred.
